getContext

public static Context getContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
Get the context from the session. Use to retrieve the existing context object. (Use getFrameContext to create a clone of the context object.)
Parameters:
session - the session for this request
Returns:
the user stored in the given session
Since:

getFrameContext

public static Context getFrameContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Get the context from the session. Use to create a clone of the context object that's safe to use on the calling thread. Create a new frame context object when you need a context that performs transaction management independently of the existing context.
Parameters:
session - the session for this request
Returns:
the user stored in the given session
Since:
ADK 8.0.2

                                                       java.lang.String fName)
                                                throws MatrixException
This method creates an input stream to a temporary file. The file is stored in the user's workspace directory It can be accessed via the workspace servlet
Parameters:
session -  
fName - - file name
